title: Matchsafe
markings: "£", the combined F and L letter to represent conventional pound sterling mark, precedes "STERLING" mark on inside lip of monogrammed side.
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangle with pointed top and blunted corners. Front: Stylized scrolls in corners connecting with scalloped shell on lid and foliate S- and C-curved border framing image of roaring lion's head in center. Back: Same border design as front. Oval medallion in center with foliate frame. Center of medallion monogrammed, "G.H.W." Lid hinged on side. Striker on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph: Matchsafe. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1980-14-115.
